titles.title: For Me to Live is Christ

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For me to live is Christ and to die is gain
And to die is gain
Cos it's no longer I but Christ that lives in me
Christ that lives in me
And the life that I now live in the flesh
I live by the faith of the Son of God
Who loved me and He gave Himself for me
That I might be free
